org.iu.gps
Class Config

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.iu.gps.Config
public class Config
extends java.lang.Object

Various methods for storing/loading Java objects from ASCII-readable configuration files.

Author:
walther

public static void main(java.lang.String[] arg)
